Languages: ActionScript, AutoHotkey, C, C++, C#, D,[14] Go, Java, JavaScript, kotlin, Objective-C, PHP, PL/I, Rexx, Rust (can be nested), Scala (can be nested), SAS, SASS, SQL, Swift, Visual Prolog, CSS
Perl6 (bracketing characters can be (), <>, {}, [], any Unicode characters with BiDi mirrorings, or Unicode characters with Ps/Pe/Pi/Pf properties)
Delphi, ML, Mathematica, Object Pascal, Pascal, Seed7, Applescript, OCaml (can be nested), Standard ML (can be nested), Maple, Newspeak, F#
MATLAB[11] (the symbols must be in a separate line)
Lisp, Scheme, Racket (can be nested in all three).
Lua (the former form can be nested, but only within the latter, which can't be nested)
